T.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date where e.emp_no < 10500 or ( s.from_date < '1990-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Alb%' and e.gender = 'M') or (e.birth_date > '1965-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%' and s.salary > 50000 );

F.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date where e.emp_no < 10510 or ( s.from_date < '1990-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Alb%' and e.gender = 'M') or (e.birth_date > '1965-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%' and s.salary > 50000 );

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date where e.emp_no < 10500 or ( s.from_date < '1990-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Alb%' and e.gender = 'M') or (e.birth_date > '1965-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%');

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date where e.emp_no < 10500 or ( s.to_date > '1990-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Alb%' and e.gender = 'F') or (e.birth_date > '1965-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%' );
